QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT ch.person_id as PersonId, hvid, patient_gender, patient_year_of_birth, patient_state + '_' + cast(patient_zip3 as varchar) location_source_value, ordering_npi, date_service, result, case when loinc_code is null then test_ordered_name else cast(loinc_code as varchar) end as lab_code, case when lower(result) = 'negative' then 45878583 when lower(result) = 'not detected' then 45878583 when lower(result) = 'positive' then 45884084 when lower(result) = 'detected' then 45884084 else 0 end as value_as_concept_id, diagnosis_code, 44814724 PeriodTypeConceptId FROM {sc}.lab JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND hvid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE where logical_delete_reason is null or logical_delete_reason = '' or logical_delete_reason = 'null' and upper(result_name) not in ('PATIENT SYMPTOMATIC?','SOURCE:','SOURCE') order by 1
